tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The quality of my life after mirena(IUD) had drastically changed. Period cramps, heavy flow were my problems. I had never stepped out of my house during periods. Also after heavy periods my recovery will take a week. Now after so many years of suffering felt what a normal periods will be. I personally ,highly recommend for women to try mirena if your doctor suggests.... U r going to have a better life. I had been using it for 7 years now. I changed my mirena last year again. Dr. Indra Nedumaran,  I am grateful to you for suggesting me mirena .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Indira, is a very humble person who embraces the patient with her smile and care. As I've visited the clinic several times I am amazed by her clinic addressing all the needs pre- pregnancy and post delivery a patient is wanting for. Right from Foot reflexology to deal with mood swings to regain body back to normal with Yoga, meditation and physio exercises. Periodical meets with expert Doctors of various disciplines to embark knowledge and clear our doubts. This clinic really has everything from AToZ for Pregnancy and other gynecological issues too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is friendly and extremely patient in listening. Answers queries in a way understandable to a lay man. Had my two daughters delivered normally under her supervision. 

She also organizes prenatal and post natal classes to help one informed of the choices, baby care, post and pre delivery care and exercises. She also has a good Team in her clinic who are always there on any emergency demands. They also exhibit good care and patience. 

I highly recommend Dr. Indhra to anyone who are looking to conceive. She's totally a people person and ensures a safe, peaceful delivery, and also provides a great moral support for the expectant parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Indra Nedumaran is very kind hearted, supportive, encouraging and transparent. *** ** *** ** *** ******* **** ************* ** **** **** ******* From the beginning she had encouraged for normal delivery. She also have a great support team (Kalai, Jeni, Raji) at her A2Z Pregnancy Care, Shenoy Nagar, Chennai clinic, who are very friendly as well as approachable. 

Also to mention Dr. Sangeetha (pediatrician) is very duty focused. She shows much care about the new born and looks after for very minute things, which many may ignore.

Overall we personally felt the entire team is duty committed and not cost conscious, as we see with few other renowned hospitals nowadays.

Thanks to all.
reply_text: We are overwhelmed by your feedback. It will make us to do our work with commitment and more focused. Thanks üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Indira mam is very supportive. I consulted her for my pregnancy from 4th month. She has been always practical enough to explain the issues and address with right solution. You can simply trust and follow her. She answered for all the queries and doubts which myself and my husband has. Among all I was tested covid positive when I was in 8th month. Only with her help I could able to cross it successfully. She had been supporting mentally too and answers all the queries when I was in-home quarantine. With all the support of her we have been blessed with girl baby. 
I would highly recommend anyone for this . 
Thank you so much mam for all the patience and support.
reply_text:
Thanks for your lovely feedback 
We are happy üòä to hear from you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi i have been consulting Dr Indhra last 6 years she had done my laparoscopy surgery  (life saving my condition was pretty bad) and later in a year i conceived naturally and delivered my baby in her safe hands i had a lot of complications throughout my pregnancy she was always available and explained all the issues and her approach was very positive. I also had a another issues not Gynecology related where i took 2nd opinion from her had to travel from Banaglore to Chennai as it required certain tests and i escaped a major surgery which was actually not required at all. I would definitely recommed her as she is one of the best dr i have come across. The assurity of being in safe hands is what u will when u meet her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi my name is Mohan & my wife's name is gayathri. My wife visiting doctor indira nedumaran for the past two months. Now she is in her sixth month
First three months we were in singapore so the first trimester treatment all we done in singapore.
After that from the 4th month we planned to continue her treatment in chennai so we counsulted our family doctor Prema in annanagar she recommended doctor indira nedumaran after that i make appointment there & my wife visited the hospital with my parents so i asked my wife about the doctor & hospital although i read the reviewa from practo.com already. My wife said i never ever see a doctor like this she is always smiling, rememberring the patients details, the way she describe about the pregnancy the counselling all was good after hereing this only i was satisfied bcoz i am in overseas i need find her a good doctor.
The doctor is so FRIENDLY, so EXPIRENCED, **** ********** TAKE CARE, PATIENT, Other than what to say i give her ***** five stars...
Thank you doctor..
And coming to fees side its quite low comparing to other hospital now a days. & also the place she reccomend for scanning & lab are also very good.
Once again Thank you Dr.
Meet u soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor explained clearly about the problem. I have seen many doctors, but no one took time to explain about the problem. Dr. INDIRA mam, patiently gives  the solution. She is very friendly and took utmost care to all the patients. When i wait for an appointment outside,  I really wonder how she remember my name inspite of many patients. She is very genuine, unique, friendly, admirable, care taker, and wonderful doctor i have ever seen. When i am worried about my ivf failure,  she use to encourage me and gives moral support that it is not big age,  u will soon become a mother. This is what we needed right. I really say that whoever has a problem in IVF,  just come once and visit her. *** ** *** ***** ** *** *** ******* *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We went to indra mam for infertility treatment 2 years we were rushed her to go with IVF but she was suggested to wait and given the best treatments along with counselling in-between 1 miscarriage 2 IUI failure so many things happened but madam has given courage and strength to us in our 3rd attempt of IUI we succeeded then the whole 10 months her team taken care myself physio and nutrition wise....... Due to babies heartbeat variation i had C section that too mam did without any Hassel and tension i too had strong confidence on mam ..... Yes we blessed with baby boy... After my c section mam came to see me in OT even in that full unconsciousness i hold her hand and told mam u have given us new life u r my god........

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I know Dr. Indra mam for more than 10 years. She is very friendly and experienced doctor in pregnancy. I had fibroids in my second pregnancy and I got scared. She gave lot of support to me even in the covid 19 period. she is very easy to reach, when ever we have  a query we can call her.  I highly recommend her for all your health problem. She is our family doctor , what ever health issue we have in our family will reach her.  I take this opportunity to thank Indra mam. Thank you so much mam for kindness and support.
